source standard doc and data req descrip: This document is used for verification of compliance with surface protection and coating requirements. Document containing records of performed surface protection and coating work. This may be required on a case by case basis (project specific).
source standard doc and data req comment: Only applicable to exposed items (such as the FFS) components, such as pumps, motors and frames shall be the manufactures standard, unless over ruled by the project datasheet.

source standard doc and data req descrip: Manufacturer certification of correct gross dry weight for the FFS (Fire Fighting skid) / FFN (fire fighting nozzles - includes nozzles/pipes and section valves).  This typically should also document the centre of gravity. Source ISO 19901-5.

A structured form containing information on the safety, health and environmental protection aspects of the chemical, including protective measures and emergency actions.ISO 11014 Safety data sheet for chemical products. A structured form containing infor
Records demonstrating results of factory tests including discrete functional unit and overall assembly, electrical, mechanical, and if applicable discharge tests.

source standard doc and data req title: Handling, shipping, storage and preservation procedure
source standard doc and data req descrip: Definition of practices to be followed during the; storage, transport, lifting and preservation of the equipment and materials included in the scope of supply to maintain their functionality and guarantees.Procedures typically define:a. packaging requir
For fire scenario engineered solutions, fire test protocols shall be developed as per the normative reference prEN 14972-1:2018 (E) Annex A
source standard doc and data req comment: To develop a system (solution) for an application where a water mist solution or international fire test protocol does not currently exist. The protocol is a collaboration between all relevant parties.

source standard doc and data req descrip: System training, certificate of attendance and training manual
source standard doc and data req comment: System training, certificate of attendance and training manual, generally carried out at the commissioning phase.

source standard doc and data req descrip: A document in which the supplier declares that the products supplied are in compliance with the requirements of the PO, and in which test results are supplied based on non-specific inspection and testingNOTE: see ISO/IEC 17000, clause 5.5 and ISO 10474 /
Insert Purchase Order Specific Requirements

A diagram detailing static and dynamic forces or movements acting on foundations or other load bearing supports, anchor bolt details, lengths and pre-tensioning. May include Civil Structural for loads imposed, and Civil Foundations for foundation design.
A drawing that depicts layout information required either by the nominated standard or supplementary specification

This document is a part of the Quality Assurance Plan, and herein the Quality Assurance work process and verification.This document provides a procedure for NDT operator to ensure repeatability and formalism and hence prove the quality of the NDT work. D

The [suppliers] proposed and acceptable transportation, lifting requirements and handling methods. Drawings shall be provided indicating size of containers / packages, centre of gravity, number off weight, identification, and packing list of contents..No

source standard doc and data req comment: May be supplied in both PDF and hard copy format.

source standard doc and data req descrip: Details of non-conformances raised by or to the [vendor/sub-vendors] against technical requirements prior to or during the delivery of the products or services. Non-conformance is managed by the [vendor] in accordance with ISO 9001 Clause 8.7 and associat

The Fluid schedule shall identify all fluid and liquid used within the equipment.May include for example:(1) corrosion inhibitors(2) fire fighting additives, including foams(3) anti freezing additive(4) greasing or lubrications.
Certification demonstrating that a welder is qualified to perform work to welding procedure specification(s).
source standard doc and data req comment: Welder Qualification Certificate is required when welding is required above the manufacturer's standard, when JIP33 Supplementary Specification for welding (S-705) is required.

source standard doc and data req descrip: Formal submission seeking [purchaser] agreement to accept deviations from the contracted scope or technical requirements. Requests may be raised as a result of, as examples, material or service availability, obsolescence, innovation, non-conformance.Requ
